author: nflaig
content:
Dora seems to be pretty accurate with the online/offline information based on what I am seeing on our nodes as well.

The main reason for Lodestar right now for missing attestations is that we don't get our attestations included in aggregates, most likely due to voting for the wrong head, seeing a lot of deep re-orgs, up to 10 blocks

But what is concerning to me is that we have around 2% of attestations being included in an aggregate but there was no block in the whole epoch that included it. I know there are a lot of missed slots but something seems off with how attestations are packed to me. I was also curious if that is that case on mainnet and I have not found a single attestation over the last 30 days for our Lido validators that had an attestation in aggregate but missed it.
